openGraph.ogDescription: This article discusses 10 common product strategy mistakes so you can avoid them and successfully leverage the product strategy.

openGraph.ogTitle: What makes users adopt a new feature or tool?
openGraph.ogDescription: How UX teams can provide key insights using technology adoption models

openGraph.ogTitle: Improving emotional intelligence as a product leader with Kate Leto
openGraph.ogDescription: We caught up with Kate Leto, product leadership coach, to talk about emotional intelligence, leadership, and coaching in product. Read on for some of her key insights.
cognitive biases and ways for product managers to navigate them
Find out what product leadership really is and how a head of product and a product manager can successfully practise it.

openGraph.ogTitle: Improving The Double Diamond Design Process — Smashing Magazine
openGraph.ogDescription: The so-called “Double Diamond” is a great way of visualizing an ideal design process — but it’s just not the way most companies deliver new projects or services. Andy Budd proposes a new “Double Diamond” idea that better aligns with the way work actually gets done and highlights the place where design has the most leverage.

openGraph.ogTitle: A Feature is not 'DONE' until it's had IMPACT — Ant Murphy
openGraph.ogDescription: If we can all agree that the outcome is important, not the output (i.e. a feature) then we shouldn't consider any item of work as 'done' until it's created the desired outcome.
